short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomizing links on Amazon allowing for random product exploration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension randomizes all links on Amazon to send user to a completely different place than intended. Explore the site in a completely unique way and figure out if the random chances may lead you to stumble upon something useful you'd least expect or send you into a tedious loop of unwanted items. Test your luck!
